mapper.insert: insert into category ( category_no, category_name, parent_category_no, category_order ) values ( #{categoryNo}, #{categoryName}, #{parentCategoryNo}, #{categoryOrder} )
mapper.select: select category_no as categoryNo, category_name as categoryName, parent_category_no as parentCategoryNo, category_order as categoryOrder from category order by category_order asc
select category_no as categoryNo, category_name as categoryName, parent_category_no as parentCategoryNo, category_order as categoryOrder from category where category_no = #{categoryNo}
mapper.update:
update category
category_name = #{categoryName},
parent_category_no = #{parentCategoryNo},
category_order = #{categoryOrder},
where category_no = #{categoryNo}
mapper.select: select category_no as categoryNo, category_name as categoryName, parent_category_no as parentCategoryNo, category_order as categoryOrder from category where parent_category_no is null order by category_order asc

select category_no as categoryNo, category_name as categoryName, parent_category_no as parentCategoryNo, category_order as categoryOrder from category where parent_category_no = #{parentNo} order by category_order asc

select category.category_no as categoryNo, category.category_name as categoryName, category.category_order as categoryOrder, attachment.attachment_no as attachmentNo, attachment.attachment_name as attachmentName, attachment.attachment_type as attachmentType from category left join category_image on category.category_no = category_image.category_no left join attachment on category_image.attachment_no = attachment.attachment_no where category.parent_category_no is null order by category.category_order

select c.category_no as categoryNo, c.category_name as categoryName, c.parent_category_no as parentCategoryNo, c.category_order as categoryOrder from category_mapping cm join category c on c.category_no = cm.category_no where cm.restaurant_id = #{value} order by c.parent_category_no nulls first, c.category_order, c.category_no
